trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME}上的mysql进程可能夯死，请注意查看！
{HOST.NAME}的mysql{#MYSQLPORT} 端口已宕掉，请注意查看！

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App MySQL For Slave New:mysql_slave_status[{#MYSQLPORT},Slave_IO_Running].str("No")}=1 or {Template App MySQL For Slave New:mysql_slave_status[{#MYSQLPORT},Slave_IO_Running].str("Connecting")}=1
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} 的mysql实例{#MYSQLPORT}的Slave_IO_Running状态不为Yes，请注意查看！
{HOST.NAME} 的mysql实例{#MYSQLPORT}的Slave_SQL_Running状态不为YES，请注意查看！

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0 and {Template App MySQL For Slave New:proc.num[keepalived,,,keepalived].change(0)}<0 and {Template App MySQL For Slave New:proc.num[keepalived,,,keepalived].last(0)}=0) or ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1 and {Template App MySQL For Slave New:proc.num[keepalived,,,keepalived].last(0)}<>3)
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}上keepalived进程已宕，请运维人员确认！
